part.text:
Added a minimal Bubble Tea buildability test and pulled in the Bubble Tea module via Go tooling so the dependency is now part of `go.mod`/`go.sum` and verified with `go test`. This wiring lives in `bubbletea_test.go` and ensures the module is buildable by instantiating a `tea.Program`, while `go.mod`/`go.sum` now include `github.com/charmbracelet/bubbletea` and its indirect dependencies.

- New test: `bubbletea_test.go`
- Dependency updates: `go.mod`, `go.sum`
- Tests run: `go test ./...`
- Commit: `feat: add bubble tea dependency`

Note: workspace still has unrelated changes in `.beads/issues.jsonl` and `runner-logs/*` that I did not touch.

If you want, I can:
1) push the commit
2) clean up or ignore the runner logs
